column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I found Bosscat Kitchen on Instagram and OMG I love this place!! The service is great! Henry was my waiter and he has gone above and beyond. The atmosphere is fantastic! I will most definitely be back! I really enjoyed the Sticky Bun Burger and the Fruity Pebbles French Toast. The Sticky Burger came together really well with the flavor and the French toast wasn't as sweet I you think when you see it. You definitely have to try it!!
